QuestData.Title: Clues Abound
QuestData.Description:
Before King Mechagon claimed this island, someone else lived here. Buried beneath this filth and garbage is the history of a forgotten people. With your help, we shall learn about these previous inhabitants.
Sir Finley has marked a location where he's seen unusual artifacts. Meet him there and see if you can discover any clues.
QuestData.LogDescription: Discover a clue about the island's history.
